thread.title: Stewart-Haas Racing Holding Press Conference Wednesday
thread.title_full: Stewart-Haas Racing Holding Press Conference Wednesday

author: Jeanette Torres
title: Stewart-Haas Racing Holding Press Conference Wednesday
text:
Share Article 
Jared C. Tilton/Getty Images (KANNAPOLIS, N.C.) -- Stewart-Haas Racing will hold a press conference at their shop in Kannapolis, North Carolina, Wednesday at 12 p.m. Eastern time. It will be attended by SHR driver Kurt Busch and co-owner Tony Stewart.Busch's contract will expire at the end of 2016, though SHR has hinted in the past that an extension is forthcoming.Busch is currently third in the Sprint Cup Series Chase standings.A car unveiling will also take place at the press conference, which will be streamed live on NASCAR.com.
